_sText:
Official PORT for Counter-Strike: Source.

(The video above is a preview of CS:GO but applies to CS:S as well)

Due to demands from multiple communities, I ported the CS:GO version of surf_greatriver_2015 to CS:S. I did this with an untouched vmf by transitioning the settings within Wall Worm which allows for an identical version between the two, no corruption or misaligned models/brushes. Huge thanks to Shawn Olson for making this possible.

If you want to find the CS:GO version, you can go here instead.



For a full list of all changes, visit the original here.

Some differences between both versions:

  • Replaced novas with m3's
  • Replaced galil-ar's with regular galils
  • Replaced SSG08's with regular scouts
 
Obviously some lighting quality and certain entities couldn't be carried over.

Version naming of the port will be identical to the CS:GO version. If you happen to confuse the files (for instance by installing the CS:S version in CS:GO and vice versa), you'll get an error message which will let you know.

Unlike CS:GO, CS:S allows the packing of all files, no additional files are included in the download.
